data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Zb6Jz1g5XggQ7kNvgFQDN9u&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCR5twLtR0dZETOhyQAXBOkJjDU5Q_Hgg2DlfC7FJom4A&oe=6647401C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kfC08eESjGAQ7kNvgFCYdA2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDuNds4yIsqqFT5ac3kvQam4CzFjUdZwUIt7DY5QwssYg&oe=664749A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aX0vzNZwJj8Q7kNvgESujNM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDW7NdtxtWcLfyPhSsNeZaT0I2XbIuR2Of7QZTlK-Vprw&oe=66473107)

Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.
![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=P7K-_HU5sUMQ7kNvgFVyMk9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAiiFVATKpR2jjKTQFAwxIEtFsXlftwXKqnNBoTkUxHsA&oe=664723E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tBMCRAlIJRYQ7kNvgGqIvx_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAXbR205uHFlkSwE6w7zXK_JeoK2C52CKw2k_3iQMO8ng&oe=66475058)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wS7TRgtwr88Q7kNvgHnLG2A&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDcrWHtlmaOa8Ruopz0MfdnuLX_rNmx6x2sB5IWbtAUZA&oe=66474CD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LWoYiC5TohwQ7kNvgHCYmu9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDaYQ3cOoP3y4ONm3SIZyR4Xvrv_tQYqmzV39EV6BHY-g&oe=664732F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2zKIDRSIg1wQ7kNvgEtK0PH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9qoJ6UiTBlFtEqimyS8aFsefESQ4zeD_muaKGnJXNSQ&oe=66471D6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WcuBO1FYt18Q7kNvgHFWcEY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCDPv9bsj6BRVqtuMOr9ktXeoblEIZ1Xrc6iJJu-TIA2g&oe=66473117)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7E8C09n9z9sQ7kNvgHMR6tI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB3Q3K9SHeJxoj35W648dOh7XXMHZN0JDCUNgXHn3vfNg&oe=66474C8C)
